title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco Products and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco Products and 

Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (tobacco product nicotine inhaling products) act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 2. The 22nd day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Public Health (Tobacco Products and Nicotine 
Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023) come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 1 to 8; 

(b) 

section 9(1)(c); 

(c) 

section 10; 

(d) 

section 28; 

(e) Part 5 (other than section 39); 

(f) Part 6 (other than section 45); 

(g) Part 7. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [669] 3
